title: Just played the new akali.... What the fuck riot.
body:
Cooldowns are up, damage is down, healing has been nerfed, and the biggest most overlooked thing? new passive doesnt hit towers like old passive.

Im literally 400 games invested into akali across 3 accounts.

And im quitting as of today, ive played one game of the new rework, and thats one game too many.

You took a champion, who is supposed to be played around her sustain capacity, and removed her sustain.

You made her into a burst based assassin.

But nerfed her damage which is retarded because unlike other burst assassins her scalings were already low as fuck and her base damage isnt enough to burst.

The only thing you kept from her kit, is her mobility, and even thats down because one dash on her w every 20 seconds does not make up for for the  fucking ult cd nerf, 2 seconds flat as opposed to 1 second at level 3, thats a 100% increase in cd. and the e received a 200% cooldown increase.

With the current kit i honestly would not be surprised if a full ad akali that does nothing but auto attack and stick to you would be infinitely more viable than ap akali right now, because like i said her kit is fucking useless after the nerfs.

And in her current state, find me one example where i would play akali, instead of diana.

Because diana does literally everything akali does right now, only better.

2 second ult cooldown? diana has a 0 second ult cooldown after the first ult assuming you land a q, or a 3.3 second ult cooldown to chain infinite ults, which means she can ult more than akali.

Ranged poke? dianas q not only hits more targets it also does more damage and has a higher range.

Utility w? i dunno about you but a shield that helps me last longer than 0.5 seconds when i go to engage is much better than dodging like what 2 auto attacks and delaying a targeted ability by half a second while im in stealth from the w.

e reverse knockback? vs 3 second cooldown ability that does less damage than the 2 second cooldown ult, and only has the purpose of doing damage.

ult? both a dash, both instant cast, diana has slight better range, diana has nearly twice akalis scaling.

Passives? first auto of akali is a 60% bonus ad 30% ap heal so assuming around 500 ap its a 150 hp heal second hit is a 50% bonus 50% ap damage ability so 250 magic damage

Dianas passive is a 80% ap scaling auto attack every 3 autos.

At base attack speed on both champs (akali 0.695 diana 0.725) akali would get off both hits of her passive before diana can get her passive off specficially 0.1 seconds before akali can pop her passive, in the time it takes diana to do 160% of her ap from two procs of her passive akali can get off 2 of her passives, on the third proc of dianas passive however akali will only be halfway through the 6 second cooldown of her own passive, further more we are talking 240% ap vs 150% ap and a total time auto attacking each other of 12.4 seconds so not a pretty viable comparison but also one that shows diana not only has more burst than akali, but also more sustain.

Up until now diana has always been "akali but better, minus the spellvamp"

now she is just "akali but better"

Now i understand why best akali FL quit.

And if i didnt play other champions? id quit too with these changes.

Settle down mate, there are buffs for akali on the pbe

Unless those buffs include reverting the passive a few number changes wont do much.

The passive was the only thing keeping her viable, she needs to either have the passive reworked or get a full rework (which is still on the books)

Basically this isnt an issue of how much damage she does or how quickly she does it.

This is an issue of the new passive being contradictory with the rest of her kit, and the old passive being what actually made her old kit work in the first place.

The reason her base damage and scaling is so low is because her old passive allowed her to survive longer than 0.1 of a second because she would heal off the damage she dealt, im sure you wouldve noticed if you ever tried to 1v1 an akali and she gets away with a slither of health from your full combo even though she only has like 1.2k health? that was her passive in action.

The new passive now only heals for at best 150 hp, compared to 50% spell vamp which was insanely easy to achieve on akali with only 2 ad items and a gunblade, which wouldve healed for somewhere in the range of 1500 hp during an extended fight, now lets say akali gets her passive off on cooldown during that same 1500hp fight she would heal for 300 hp now.

Thats a 500% nerf to her self healing.

Or to put it another way, she now heals for 20% of the healing she did pre rework.

With no compensation for all that healing loss in her kit meaning sure you can buff her damage, but she isnt going to survive long enough to kill you with that damage.

infact all this nerf does is provide a reason to never play akali as an assassin anymore unless you go tank.

because yes diana literally does akalis job better than her in a kit for kit comparison unless akali goes tank, and then akali isnt even an assassin anymore if she goes tank.

Further more Best Akali FL a challenger akali main and over on the akali mains reddit regarded as THE akali main, is gone, he quit league, because of this rework.

Yeah if you want to pick up diana btw you are gonna want to get 45% cdr somehow to get the same feel as akali with the ults (3.3 second ult, not quite as good as old akali but the q-ult combo does more damage than akalis entire kit put together atm so its forgivable) probably the best way is to go nashors lich bane and some token 10% item probably abyssal, thats a pretty good 3 item core for her and also gives you a decent chunk of ap mr and attack speed for her passive.

Also a little trick is to ult before your q actually lands, if you time it right you can hit about 0.2 seconds earlier and still land as the q lands which shaves 0.2 seconds off your combo time, which doesnt sound like much but when we are talking 0.5 second burst kills here, thats still a decent chunk of time.

Also use w in your combo, even though its a shield if you ult onto someone it seems to always hit with all 3 orbs which makes your burst damage go through the bloody roof.

If you can get used to new kats playstyle she is a pretty good pick aswell, with 45% cooldown i can e about 4 times in the span of a couple seconds by qing someone eing to the dagger wing as i land walking back past them eing back to the dagger qing again and then e wing again and still not have my e on cooldown, honestly feels like playing yasuo.
